entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character in the story, mentioned as walking behind Hermione and having no idea what she's planning.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a character in the story, leading Harry down the corridor and making plans without telling him.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a character in the story, walking behind Harry and Hermione and breathing heavily.

relationships.description: Harry follows Hermione down the corridor, trying not to appear suspicious.
Hermione is followed by Umbridge as they walk down the corridor.
